reviewText: A very entertaining, as well as informative flick, if you're interested in the how & why of the Salt Lake Temple construction.  I've enjoyed watching this for about 25 years.  It never gets old or boring.
Excellent movie, well made and acted. Accurate to history and a good story line. I would recommend it to anyone.
I received the dvd in a timely manner.  There was no damage to the case or the dvd and the dvd played perfectly on our bluray player.
An old favorite with lots of interesting history regarding the building of the Salt Lake Temple.
Love this movie.  Gives a great history of the building of the Salt Lake LDS temple.
The story of a people of faith trying to complete something they were asked to do. Enjoyed
This is one great movie, at least it is to me it was.  I had the VHS movie but wanted it on DVD.
Excellent video about the building of the Salt Lake Temple. Lots of interesting info.
Good acting and, as far as I know, historically accurate.  A real keeper.  I am including it with the DVDs I am saving for future viewing.
